about_the_game:
"Labyrinths Around the World" offers an expansive and diverse array of sound assets designed for RPG Maker MV and RPG Maker MZ.

Tailored for 2D RPGs, this collection features 16 dungeon BGM tracks, including a range of low-difficulty early dungeon battle BGM, a component often missing in RPG development.
This pack also includes 3 exciting event songs.
A holistic variety of regular dungeon tunes, including tracks for humid, dimly lit caves, dry sandstone ruins, and undersea temples add a range of diversity to your game quests!


*******************************************
Audio：19
Dungeon bgm :16
Event bgm :3
*******************************************

-----

・This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
・OK to be used in Commercial projects made in RPG Maker
・You may modify some of the assets (but not redistribute them) for your own game use only.
